00134 
00135                         // returns the next complex ptr on the vector and increments iterator.  Returns 0 if at the end of the vector.
00136                         Complex * nextComplex() {  return (complexIter_public < allComplexes.end() ? *complexIter_public++ : 0);  };

00624 
00625 
00626                         //Functionality for local functions
00627 
00628                         /* Type I local functions are functions that this molecule type needs to have
00629                          * always updated because it can react in a DOR reaction which needs the specified
00630                          * function.  DOR reactions identify these MoleculeTypes and add their function to
00631                          * the list of Type I functions for this MoleculeType.
00632                          *
00633                          * Type II local functions are those that require this MoleculeType as an observable
00634                          * or counter to be evaluated.  When this molecule gets updated, it has to automatically
00635                          * update all of its type II local functions.
00636                          *
00637                          * These functions return the index in the array indicating where these functions were
00638                          * added.  This allows local functions to quickly update molecules that need the local
00639                          * function information.
00640                          */
00641                         int addLocalFunc_TypeI(LocalFunction *lf);
00642                         int addLocalFunc_TypeII(LocalFunction *lf);
00643                         vector <LocalFunction *> locFuncs_typeI;
00644                         vector <LocalFunction *> locFuncs_typeII;
00645 
00646                         int getNumOfTypeIFunctions() const {return locFuncs_typeI.size(); };
00647                         LocalFunction *getTypeILocalFunction(int index) { return locFuncs_typeI.at(index); };
00648                         int getNumOfTypeIIFunctions() const {return locFuncs_typeII.size(); };
00649                         LocalFunction *getTypeIILocalFunction(int index) { return locFuncs_typeII.at(index); };
00650 
00651                         int getNumOfDORrxns() const { return indexOfDORrxns.size(); };
00652                         ReactionClass * getDORrxn(int dorRxnIndex) const { return reactions.at(indexOfDORrxns.at(dorRxnIndex)); };
00653                         int getDORrxnIndex(int dorRxnIndex) const { return indexOfDORrxns.at(dorRxnIndex); };
00654                         int getDORrxnPosition(int dorRxnIndex) const { return reactionPositions.at(indexOfDORrxns.at(dorRxnIndex)); };

00705                         ReactionClass *rxn; /*used so we don't need to redeclare this at every call to updateRxnMembership */
00706 
00707 
00708 
00709                 private:
00710                         //Some iterators so we don't have to instantiate a new iterator every time
00711                         vector<Molecule *>::iterator molIter;  /* to iterate over mInstances */
00712                         vector<MoleculesObservable *>::iterator molObsIter; /* to iterate over observables */
00713                         vector <ReactionClass *>::iterator rxnIter; /* to iterate over reactions */
00714         };

00957         class ReactionClass
00958         {
00959                 // _NETGEN_
00960                 friend class MatchSetIter;
00961                 friend class Netgen;
00962 
00963                 public:
00964                         static const int NO_LIMIT = -3;
00965 
00966                         static const int BASIC_RXN = 0;
00967                         static const int DOR_RXN = 1;
00968                         static const int OBS_DEPENDENT_RXN = 2;
00969 
00970 
00971 
00972                         ReactionClass(string name, double rate, string baseRateParameterName, TransformationSet *transformationSet, System *s);
00973                         virtual ~ReactionClass();
00974 
00975                         int getNumOfReactants() const { return n_reactants; };
00976 
00977                         string getName() const { return name; };
00978                         double getBaseRate() const { return baseRate; };
00979                         int getRxnType() const { return reactionType; };
00980 
00981                         void setBaseRate(double newBaseRate,string newBaseRateName) {
00982                                 if(isDimerStyle) {
00983                                         this->baseRate=newBaseRate*0.5;
00984                                 }
00985                                 else this->baseRate=newBaseRate;
00986                                 this->baseRateParameterName=newBaseRateName;
00987                                 update_a();
00988                         };
00989 
00990                         void resetBaseRateFromSystemParamter();
00991 
00992                         void setTraversalLimit(int limit) { this->traversalLimit = limit; };
00993 
00994                         double get_a() const { return a; };
00995                         virtual void printDetails() const;
00996                         void fire(double random_A_number);
00997 
00998                         //For DOR reactions
00999                         virtual void notifyRateFactorChange(Molecule * m, int reactantIndex, int rxnListIndex) = 0;
01000                         virtual int getDORreactantPosition() const { cerr<<"Trying to get DOR reactant Position from a reaction that is not of type DOR!"<<endl;
01001                         cerr<<"this is an internal error, and so I will quit."<<endl; exit(1); return -1; };
01002 
01003 
01004                         //The main virtual functions that must be implemented in all implementing classes
01005                         virtual void init() = 0; //called when the reaction is added to the system
01006                         virtual void prepareForSimulation() = 0; //called once everything is added to the system
01007                         virtual bool tryToAdd(Molecule *m, unsigned int reactantPos) = 0;
01008                         virtual void remove(Molecule *m, unsigned int reactantPos) = 0;
01009 
01010                         virtual double update_a() = 0;
01011 
01012 
01013 
01014                         /* turn the tag of this guy on */
01015                         void tag() { tagged = true; };
01016 
01017 
01018                         virtual unsigned int getReactantCount(unsigned int reactantIndex) const = 0;
01019                         virtual void printFullDetails() const = 0;
01020 
01021 
01022                         void setRxnId(int rxnId) { this->rxnId = rxnId; };

01024 
01025 
01026                         void turnOff_OnTheFlyObs() { onTheFlyObservables=false; };
01027 
01028 
01029                         void setTotalRateFlag(bool totalRate) { totalRateFlag = totalRate; };
01030

01034
